section.title: Configuring Node Domain Name Services (DNS)

procedure.para: the Node supports the specification of one or more Domain Name Services (DNS) servers. These servers will be used when resolving host and domain names

step.para: To set or change the primary DNS server select the DNS Server 1 field and enter the IP address of the new primary DNS server to use.
To set or change the secondary DNS server select the DNS Server 2 field and enter the IP address of the new secondary DNS server to use.
Select <Apply>, and press Enter to save changes to the DNS configuration.

section.para: The primary and secondary DNS servers queried by the Node are updated.
